title.rendered: Student Voices Event Planned For April 26

content.rendered:
We invite you to attend a Student Voices event on Wednesday, April 26 2023 at 6 p.m. The event will be held at the Saratoga Springs High School Auditorium. Hear from a panel of current students who are committed to making our school community more inclusive. Attendees will also have the opportunity to learn about the district’s No Place for Hate work and stop at tables to talk to student representatives.   

All SSCSD families and school community members are invited to attend.  Free ice cream will be served!
